latest_news_onclick.Heading: Version 6.5
latest_news_onclick.New Features:
Changelog: 
1. Fixed Reel video downloading issue. 
2. Fixed facebook video downloading issues. 
3. Added Business Status Saver Support 
4. Added performance mode for older device(RAM less than 4Gb) 
5. Now you can report bugs easily so that we will release updates fastly.

latest_news: Now you can download story from multiple accounts at same time. No need to login again & again. Improved the Bulk downloader.

notify_click.New Features:
Hi,
1. Added Pdisk videos can be downloaded to your gallery(No More Playit app needed).
2. Now we support more than 50+ sites.

If you have any issues, don't hesitate to mail us

forceupdate_dialog.Heading: Version 7.2
forceupdate_dialog.New Features:
Changelog: 1. Fixed Crashes on some devices. 
2. Added Premium Version (users can subscribe to remove ads).
3. Fixed Anonfiles downloading crash.
3. Now you can report bugs easily so that we will release updates fastly.

forcedialog_issues_dialog.Heading: Attention
forcedialog_issues_dialog.Text1:
Due to New changes made my social app, Instagram downloading is not working. Our team working on a fix.
